articles.title: Can I Stop Therapy? - The Cut
articles.description: For years, we were told therapy was the key to living a good life. What if we don’t want to go anymore? Melissa Dahl spoke with therapy quitters like herself — people who have been helped by talk therapy but are in the mood for a less examined life.
